content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Hello, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I would like to offer you a rental price of 700 Euros per month. This price takes into consideration the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, that's fair. I can agree to that price.
So the price is 700 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller

content: Yes, that's correct. The rental price for the apartment is 700 Euros per month. I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before signing the lease agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, that's all. Thank you very much. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
So the price is 700 Euros per month, and you will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
name: Max Müller

content: Yes, that's correct. The rental price for the apartment is 700 Euros per month, and you will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. I appreciate your prompt response and look forward to working with you as your tenant. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to contact me.
name: Heinrich Heine
